title: Birth certificates and death certificates
dataVerified: Name, DOB/DOD, parents, place of birth/death
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Shows the issuer domain and the responder text (e.g., "Valid ID" or "Denied").
rationale: Prevents identity fraud, fake birth certificates for fraudulent documents. Domain binding verifies issuing jurisdiction. Ornate certificate format benefits from OCR. Permanent vital records.
